name: Escape The Rooms:The Prison Escape Of Castle
name_original: Escape The Rooms:The Prison Escape Of Castle
description:
You found a huge treasure in an ancient castle, but the bad guys locked you in the prison and wanted to monopolize the treasures you found.

Quickly escape the prison and grab the treasure you found!

* Exquisite Graphics
* Clever puzzles
* From easy to difficult, suitable for all players
